reference.title: Proptable feechers
reference.shortdesc: Shows what can happen when you skip proptype & propvalue in a properties table.

property.propvalue: propvalue only - should be preceeded by a blank column

property.propdesc: propdesc only - should be preceeded by 2 blank columns
propdesc with proptype- should be preceeded by 1 blank column in between
